titles.title: A resolution to designate the period beginning on November 1, 2005 and ending on October 31, 2006 as the Year of Polio Education.
A resolution to designate the period beginning on November 1, 2005 and ending on October 31, 2006 as the Year of Polio Education.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the period from November 1, 2005, through October 31, 2006, as the Year of Polio Education.
